definition: to pile up/to accumulate without being dealt with

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: We would rather cut down the price than keep a large quantity of goods in stock.
sentences.chinese: 我们宁肯降低价格，也不愿积压大量货物。

sentences.english: These documents all relate that how to face and address sample backlog.
sentences.chinese: 这些文献都涉及怎么面对以及处理样本的检材积压。

sentences.english: The western railroads are still trying to catch up with their delivery delays that built up this crop year.
sentences.chinese: 目前西部铁路仍在赶运本作物年度积压的迟发货物。

sentences.english: The buyer's capital will be tied up from the time of remitting it until the goods arrive and are sold.
sentences.chinese: 从汇款时起直到货物到达和销售掉，买方会积压资金。

sentences.english: Through hardships of a year, sell product of keep long in stock one sky eventually.
sentences.chinese: 经过一年的艰辛，终于将积压产品销售一空。

sentences.english: There exists a great quantity of coal resources under "Three Unders" in some coal mine.
sentences.chinese: 某煤矿因“三下”环境积压了大量煤炭资源。

sentences.english: For counting purposes, they consider any current case as backlogged.
sentences.chinese: 为确定其数目，他们将现有案件都看成积压案件。

sentences.english: We must be able to reduce our backlog of claims.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须有能力处理积压下来的索赔单据。

sentences.english: However, on the question of how to deal with the backlog products, financial analysis cannot answer.
sentences.chinese: 但对于如何处理积压产品，财务分析不能够回答。

sentences.english: It takes years to work through the overhanging supply of credit.
sentences.chinese: 这需要好几年的时间才能消化掉积压着的信贷。

sentences.english: It takes years to work through the overhanging supply of Jaguars.
sentences.chinese: 这需要好几年的时间才能消化掉积压着的捷豹汽车。

sentences.english: Depression is often the result of long periods of stress that have gone unrelieved.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁是没有得到释放的压力长期积压的结果。

sentences.english: Where is the feeling sitting in your body?
sentences.chinese: 这个感觉积压在你身体里哪个地方？

sentences.english: The shop decided to clear off all the old stock in the storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 该商店决定把仓库中所有积压的存货处理掉。

sentences.english: The number of backlogged cases in crime laboratories changes daily.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪实验室积压案件的数量每天都在发生变化。

sentences.english: eg. We would rather cut down the price than keep a large quantity of goods in stock.
sentences.chinese: 我们宁肯降低价格，也不愿积压大量货物。

definition: to drain (by leading off water)/to unburden oneself/to divulge/to leak a secret
to stockpile
to save bit by bit/to accumulate
to give vent to (one's feelings)
to coalesce/to gather together/to amass
to pile up like a mountain (idiom)/a mountain of (paperwork etc)/a large number of sth
to stock up/to lay in supplies/to hoard (for speculation)/to corner the market in sth
grievance/accumulated rancor
to accumulate
to relieve/to ease (pressure)/to alleviate/to remove/to get rid of
property or cash held in reserve/stock
to bury/to hide by burying/hidden
to detain/retention
to constrain or repress emotions/oppressive/stifling/depressing/repression
stock/inventory (of material)
to shelve/to set aside
